title: STAT+: New FDA guidance for antibiotic use in food-producing animals prompts criticism over antibiotic resistance
description: New FDA guidance on the use of antibiotics in food-producing animals has prompted criticism that it fails to consider the impact on human health.
content: New FDA guidance on the use of antibiotics in food-producing animals has prompted criticism that it fails to consider the impact on human health.
